article: Welcome to the City Zoo! There are many  _  in the zoo. Let's see the koalas first. Koalas are  _  Australia. They are quiet,  _  and cute. Children like them very much. The kangaroos are also from  _  . They are quiet and interesting,  _  they are not friendly. The giraffes come from Africa. They have a  _  neck . They like to eat leaves. The lions are also from Africa. They are exciting, but a little  _  . Many people don't like  _  . We also have pandas. They are from China. They are very cute and friendly, but they are very shy. So please be  _  . Have  _  and enjoy yourself here!
